onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.ChatActivity
listens to: btnSendMessage; if it clicked we check for problems(empty field), if field not empty send it to firebase(now the listener located here and not in FBhelper because it may not be initialized if we closed app and came to activity from notification)
onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.LVHelper
handles click on btnCreateGroup in the createGroupDialog(button located at cgs);
onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.UserOptionsSystem
handles click on btnSendMail.
onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.LoginSystem.LoginActivity
handles click on: btnLogin, btnCreateAccount, btnSignup
onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
handles clicks on checkboxes - uiHelper.chkSendLocation(if to send location in general), uiHelper.chkAccessLocation(if allow current group to access location);
onClick(View) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
handles click: uiHelper.floatingPlus(to add group), uiHelper.floatingEye(hide listView), uiHelper.floatingArrowBack(change LVState from showing users to showing groups), uiHelper.btnJoinLeaveGroup, uiHelper.btnOpenChat
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.ChatActivity
Simply initialize the variables; get the current groups name and key from intent's extras
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.LoginSystem.LoginActivity
we check if we can autologin, if yes do so, otherwise user has to login
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
simply initializes the 3 variables and calls function to get async google-map
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.ChatActivity
if we are already listening to this chat change the menu item action_listen to IGNORE and not LISTEN
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
 
onDestroy() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.MyChatService
 
onDestroy() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
remove all listeners to firebase(in case we rotate screen listeners aren't removed, and onDestroy 100% called on rotation)
onItemClick(AdapterView<?>, View, int, long) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
if clicked on group - show group's data+users; if clicked on user, move map camera to his location if visible
onItemLongClick(AdapterView<?>, View, int, long) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
if performed longClick on listItem that is USER, then show dialog of possible actions; if longClick on one of my groups, show dialog to change group settings
onMapReady(GoogleMap) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
if map ready create instance of mapManager
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.ChatActivity
if we clicked on item with text "LISTEN" so start new MyChatService; otherwise disable MyChatService because we want to stop listening to notifications from that group; if we clicked on the 'privacy' section we will enable/disable showing my name during chatting with others
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
handles on menu click: action_changemap, action_logout, action_namechange.
onPause() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
stop retrieving others locations and sharing mine location to others when outside of app, reset my location data.
onReceive(Context, Intent) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.BootReceiver
if boot completed create intent that redirects to MyChatService.class; and add sign to the intentExtras so it knows that we came from BootReceiver
onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
if location permission enabled - enable my location in google map
onResume() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapsActivity
if map initialized check if location getter thread is still working, if yes do nothing if not put it on; if were sending my location to firebase before onPause, resume it
onStartCommand(Intent, int, int) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.MyChatService
initializes everything, checks intent extras if pendingIntent should be to app or not, and in case we aren't from BootReceiver binds listener to chat in firebase that will show last message in notification bar
onStop() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.ChatSystem.ChatActivity
finish the activity onStop; made to avoid some weird bugs, for example that you can open multiple intents via notification
